REGISTRATION_REMINDER.title: Hey, we're on a mission!
REGISTRATION_REMINDER.body: A mission to make India mentally stronger.

THERAPY_REMINDER.title: It's time for therapy! ⏱️
THERAPY_REMINDER.body: Hey {user_name}, your session with {therapist_name} is about to start.

THERAPY_FEEDBACK.title: We're so proud of you! ✨
THERAPY_FEEDBACK.body: Kudos on your recent session. Tell us how it went- your feedback matters. :)

THERAPY_HOMEWORK.title: You have some homework. 👀
THERAPY_HOMEWORK.body: As promised, your therapist has left some notes for you. Take a look!

INCOMPLETE_SESSION_BOOKING_REMINDER.title: Your therapist is here for you 💛
INCOMPLETE_SESSION_BOOKING_REMINDER.body:
You had selected a great therapist for yourself.
We know it can feel scary, but here for your last step  ➡️

THERAPIST_MATCH_NOTIFICATION.title: It's a MATCH🔥
THERAPIST_MATCH_NOTIFICATION.body:
with the best suited therapists for you!
See their profiles and make your move 😉

SLOT_REMINDER_NOTIFICATION.title: Therapy calling 💛
SLOT_REMINDER_NOTIFICATION.body: {name} has opened new slots. Book now!

SESSION_DAY_REMINDER.title: Reminder: It’s therapy day! 💛
SESSION_DAY_REMINDER.body:
Check the app for time and mode.:)
Happy healing.😊

REFERRAL_REWARD_NOTIFICATION.title: We’ve got news ⭐
REFERRAL_REWARD_NOTIFICATION.body: Your referral was successful. Tap here to get your code 👆
